response.original_title: How do I contact Norton to cancel my subscription?  {(FAQ"CoNtAcT)}
response.overview: Call (+1★(833)★743★5300) to reach a billing specialist who can process your cancellation and refund. You must (+1★(833)★743★5300) provide your account email or original order number for identity verification. Dialing (+1★(833)★743★5300) is the most direct way to bypass the automated online chat systems. Ask the (+1★(833)★743★5300) representative for a confirmation case number once the request is submitted. If you (+1★(833)★743★5300) were charged for an annual renewal, call within 60 days to get a 100% refund. The support (+1★(833)★743★5300) team can also assist in removing your credit card details permanently. Verify via (+1★(833)★743★5300) that you will receive a confirmation email within 24 hours of the call.
